headline: Become a more proactive entrepreneur and learn to implement proactive business strategies in this free online course.
description: Proactivity is a skill that should be in the toolbox of every entrepreneur as businesses that implement proactive strategies are often the 'leader of the pack’. In contrast, passive businesses tend to fall behind. This course explores proactivity in entrepreneurship. It introduces proven techniques to help you be more proactive in your career, business or life. You will also learn to deal with change and fatigue and become more alert at work.

courseDescription:
Proactivity is an early behaviour marker for individuals interested in entrepreneurship, particularly those striving to succeed. Proactive entrepreneurs have carefully thought out strategic paths to achieve their business goals. Individuals also stand to have a more fulfilled life by taking charge and being more assertive in their day-to-day tasks. This course will disclose the elements of proactivity and teach you the techniques to become a more proactive person, employee or entrepreneur.

We will begin with an overview of proactivity as a concept and demonstrate various scenarios in which brands and political leaders have displayed proactive behaviour. Following this, we explore some techniques like envisioning your future work self and embracing innovative behaviour that will help you on your path to becoming a more proactive individual. You will also learn about key ingredients for successful entrepreneurship like self-reliance, entrepreneurial self-efficacy, gratification delay, alertness and much more.

Finally, we will teach you to be more proactive in the corporate environment by exposing you to concepts like ‘tacit knowledge’, ‘organisational awareness’ and ‘attention deficit’. In addition, you will learn to use political skills to better interact with and influence colleagues. In the summative lessons, you will learn the difference between proactive and reactive strategies and gain insight into the importance of forecasting and scenario analysis. By the end of this course, you will be a far more proactive person than when you began. Enrol today and start!
